long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is a Google Chrome extension that can will function as a turn clock to be used on Untap.in.
After loading into an Untap.in game, refresh the page. The first turn will start once the turn is passed. Commands that can be used can be found here: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1PWVvq-GuDS0DqOkagV7HHNIGqZVeq25Xqv__8DTnE-4/edit?usp=sharing
